item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? My online ID is shinpu, I’m from Poland ðŸ‡µðŸ‡± I’m studying ICT and have a deep interest in computer science. To pass time I read manga, program stupid little programs, create bash scripts or find new software to self host. I plan to share some services to the public and write about some technical stuff. Where to find me? Code : Github for most of my projects Steam : I play games (sometimes) Osu : Average 5digit player Anilist : Adding series there when I feel like it Contact information Email: shinpuu@protonmail.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Project List Hugo makes use of a variety of open source projects including: VLFS (a game made in godot as a joke) libreoffice calendar (learning python library ) Tower defense SFML (a game made in CPP SFML for uni) This website More coming soon… Learn more and contribute on GitHub.
